Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored 10 points, dished one assist and committed one turnover
He knocked down his first shot from downtown off a LeBron assist
He connected on a 3-pointer to extend his tally to 10 points for the night
Pre-Game Insights: It was expected from him, considering he was viewed as a polished prospect compared to his draft mates after spending four years in college
Post-Match Reflections: His stock within the Lakers staff is steadily rising because of his gravity on offense and serviceable defense
He's essential to Redick's offensive game plan that revolves around spacing, player and ball movement
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dalton Knecht entered the game in the second quarter in a lineup with LeBron James, D'Angelo Russell, Rui Hachimura and Jaxson Hayes
He's also looked comfortable for someone only in his rookie season
The Lakers are benefiting from it amid their injury troubles
Others: Dalton Knecht played 20:10 minutes of action with three personal fouls
He shot 4 of 7, including 2 of 5 from deep
